full_desc_with_verices.text: YAD VASHEM The Holocaust Martyrs' and Heroes' Remembrance Authority www.yadvashem.org Hall of Names, P.O.B. 3477, Jerusalem 91034 Page of Testimony าษ กร QVI T רשות הזיכרון לשואה ולגבורה היכל השמות, ת.ז 3477 ירושלים 91034 www.yadvashem.org Pages of Testimony commemorate the Jews who were murdered during the Holocaust - Shoah. Please submit a separate form for each victim, in block capitals. Fields outlined in bold are mandatory. Victim's photo Please write victim's name on back. Do not glue. The Martyrs' and Heroes' Remembrance Law 5713-1953 determines in section 2 that: "The task of Yad Vashem is to gather into the homeland material regarding all those members of the Jewish people who laid down their lives, who fought and rebelled against the Nazi enemy and his collaborators, and to perpetuate their names and those of the communities, organizations and institutions which were destroyed because they were Jewish". Victim's family name: BATISZ (BATISH) Victim's first name (or nickname): Maiden name: Title: Place of birth (town, region, country): First name of victim's father: First name of victim's mother: Victim's family status and no. of children: Previous other family name: BERTHA Gender: Male Female Date of birth: Approx. age at death: 6 ZLOCHOW, GALICIA Citizenship: AN POUSH POLAND CHAIM KLARA Family name of victim's father: BATISZ (BATISH) Maiden name of victim's mother: ROSEN First name of victim's spouse: Maiden name of n/a Permanent residence ZLOCHOW, GALICIA, POLAND (town, region, country): Victim's profession: CHILD Place of work: victim's spouse: a Street: Member of organization or movement: Places and activities during the war arrest / deportation (ghetto) camp/ death march/hiding/escape/ resistance / combat (circle relevant): Residence during the war Street: (town, region, country): Circumstances of death: prison / deportation ghetto camp (mass murder/death march / hiding / escape / resistance / combat or unknown - Shoah: Place of death (town, region, country): ZLOCHOW OR BELZEC ? Date of death: 1943(? I, the undersigned, hereby declare that this testimony is correct to the best of my knowledge. I understand that this Page of Testimony and all the information on it will be publicly accessible. Submitter's first name: MICHAEL Family name NEUSTEIN 2/40 BENELONG CRESCENT Street, house no., Apt.: Country: AUSTRALIA City Previous maiden name: State / Zip code: NSW 2023 I am a Shoah survivor: Yes/No BELLEVUE HILL My relationship to the victim (family / other): COUSIN During the war I was in a camp/ghetto forest/in hiding/had false papers/ the resistance (circle relevant): Date: 20 JULY 2020. Place: SYDNEY Signature: ונתתי להם בביתי ובחומתי יד ושם... אשר לא יכרת“ ישעיהו ב"ו ה' And I shall give them in My house and within My walls a memorial and a name... that shall not be cut off" Issiah, str 2011-2012
